description: Discover and list all InfiniBand switches in the subnet. Queries the Subnet Manager to enumerate all switches in the InfiniBand fabric topology.

installation.notes: Part of infiniband-diags package. Install via: apt install infiniband-diags or yum install infiniband-diags

global_options.description: Use specified CA name for queries
Use specified CA port for queries
Timeout for SA queries in milliseconds

common_usage_patterns.description: List all switches in InfiniBand fabric
common_usage_patterns.output_example:
Switch  : 0x0002c90300abc000 ports 36 "MF0;leaf-switch-01:SX6036/U1" lid 10 lmc 0
Switch  : 0x0002c90300abc001 ports 36 "MF0;leaf-switch-02:SX6036/U1" lid 11 lmc 0
Switch  : 0x0002c90300def000 ports 36 "MF0;spine-switch-01:QM8790/U1" lid 20 lmc 0

common_usage_patterns.description: List switches with specific port count

error_messages.resolution: Load IB kernel modules or verify IB devices are present
Verify SM is running and accessible

interoperability.notes: Queries SA database. Output shows switch GUID, port count, description, LID, and LMC.

permissions.notes: Requires access to InfiniBand device files

limitations: Only shows switches visible to SA
Switch descriptions depend on SM configuration
Does not show switch port states (use iblinkinfo)

reads_from.description: Reads switch information from Subnet Administrator

triggered_by.effect: New switch appears after SM rediscovery

consistent_with.shared_state: GUIDs unique across all fabric devices
